resource.chars:
in his communication. The 
gradual development of the 
body from a small size 
when it is lodged within a 
muscular fibre & usually 
invested with a curious 
setose coat into the fully 
formed & armed cysticercus 
appears to me to admit 
of no doubt. Of its earlier 
history & of its supposed 
origin in an elongated 
collection of granules the 
evidence is less clear, & it 
is here that the hiatus exists
